## Why USE Psychological Network Models

1.  New perspective of visualizing the "ecosystem" your are interested in
2.  Highlight most important nodes based on the link strength or the number of links
3.  Highlight the bridge nodes that connect multiple sub-ecosystems that may be target for intervention
4.  Group differences in network way
